CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "None") , ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "Scheduled"), ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "Dispatched") , ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "In Progress")), NOT( ISNULL( GDMFSL_Sold_To_Source_System_Reference__c ))) , GDMFSL_Sold_To_Source_System_Reference__r.GDMFSL_Delivery_Block__c , false)
CustomField.label: Delivery Block
